experience.title: Chairperson
experience.description: SIAM stands for Society for Industrial and Applied Mathematics. It aims at dispensing required tools and knowledge for students to excel in fields of applied mathematics such as computational science, forensics,cryptography etc. It provides a bridge for students to apply the classroom knowledge to real world applications and push the boundaries of their curriculum to explore their field of interest through projects, research, industrial visits and internships.Our mission is to build cooperation between mathematics and world of science and technology through publication. Our premier event is VIT’s got talent which has attracted huge crowd. We also host an international conference - ICAMS.Furthermore, we have conducted various sessions on Python, Web development, Design and Data mining.
experience.description_html: SIAM stands for Society for Industrial and Applied Mathematics. Our premier event is VIT’s got talent which has attracted huge crowd. We also host an international conference - ICAMS.Furthermore, we have conducted various sessions on Python, Web development, Design and Data mining.

positions.subtitle: ALPHA BIO CELL
positions.description: An Bio-Entrepreneurship club in VIT which I started with the aim to develop entrepreneurship spirit in VITians. We were able to conduct multiple events in my Tenure with events as big as hackathons with budget over 2 lakh INR and CISCO was the sponsor for the events.
